text:
We're both thinking about something important?
Okay, let's say it together. Ready, set──
Wait a moment, what are we talking about──

If I've caused any misunderstanding...
I'm sorry for troubling you...

...I didn't mean to... It's just, I love L'Antica...
I love everyone in L'Antica so much...

Even if everyone... doesn't come back to Antica...
I'll still cheer for them with joy...

Because there's been more solo activities...
I just... thought about disbandment...?

Hey, did you ever think that you were the one...
who treasured Antica the most?

...Um, Sakuya-san...
I... I care so much about Antica...

But... I've never...
expressed it in words... I'm sorry...

Heh... I'm such a...
...such a fool...

You're not a fool.
You were just thinking about difficult things...

I'm sorry, everyone... I've caused...
trouble for everyone this time... No, um... no──

I... I promise this time...!
I'll trust everyone... and rely on them.
